Package gui

Class GraphicalUserInterface

java.lang.Object
gui.GraphicalUserInterface
public class GraphicalUserInterface extends Object
This class launches the GUI game and manages the screens.
Author:
Farzad and Daniel

    • launchSleepAlert

      public void launchSleepAlert()
      Goes to sleep. If the game is over, then shows game over alert and then the stats screen. If the game is not over, then shows the overnight events alert.
